page.title: 04CHILDREN'S GAMES-1
page.content: "Cats got the measles, Dogs got the flu, Chickens got the chickenpox, And out goes you." You cross and uncross your legs to the rhyme. If you land with legs crossed you pull one sock down. When both socks are down you are out. POLO There is a caller,the others stand in a line.The caller calls out something like "trees" all the others whisper a kind of tree to a messenger that the caller has chosen. The messenger tells the caller all the different trees the others have chosen but not who has chosen which.The caller then calls out the name of a tree. The person who chose that tree races the caller to the wall. The last one of the 2 is the new caller.
